Package personal.gym

Class DataCenterApplication

java.lang.Object
personal.gym.DataCenterApplication
public class DataCenterApplication
extends java.lang.Object
Main controller of the app.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yu Deng, Philippe Gabriel, Julien Thibeault, Yan Zhuang

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DataCenterApplication()
    Constructor method for initializing the app controller.

  • Constructor Details

    • DataCenterApplication

      public DataCenterApplication()
      Constructor method for initializing the app controller. Loads appropriate .dat files if present.

  • Method Details

    • overwriteDataFiles

      public void overwriteDataFiles()
      Overwrites the data on the disk with data from the structure objects of the different list attributes. This method is called when exiting the application and overwrite any .dat files of the same name.

    • showMessage

      public static void showMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Prints onto the console to notify the user of a given message.
      Parameters:
      message - Information to display to the user

    • generateWeeklySessionsReport

      public void generateWeeklySessionsReport()
      Generates a weekly services report file. One of the steps belonging to the accounting procedure which can be commenced at will.

    • getPerson

      public Person getPerson​(java.lang.String code, Type type)
      Retrieves the person associated with the given number depending on the provided type or null if not present.
      Parameters:
      code - Person's code
      type - Person's type
      Returns:
      Person associated with given code of the given type or null if no code associated

    • changeStatus

      public void changeStatus​(java.lang.String code, Type type, Status status)
      Changes the status of a given person.
      Parameters:
      code - Person code
      type - Person type
      status - Modified status

    • accessGym

      public void accessGym​(java.lang.String memberNo)
      Grants access to the #GYM facility if the member's status is valid.
      Parameters:
      memberNo - Member number

    • createPerson

      public void createPerson​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String province, java.lang.String postalCode, java.lang.String email, Type type)
      Performs the membership procedure by associating the provided credentials to a new account in the system.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the individual
      address - Address of the individual
      city - City of the individual
      province - Province of the individual
      postalCode - Postal code of the individual
      email - Facebook account of the individual
      type - Type of membership requested

    • modifyPerson

      public void modifyPerson​(Person person, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String province, java.lang.String postalCode, java.lang.String email)
      Modifies information relative to the provided existing account. A StatusException is thrown if a member's status does not permit them to modify their information.
      Parameters:
      person - Person to modify
      name - Modified person name
      address - Modified person address
      city - Modified person city
      province - Modified person province
      postalCode - Modified person postal code
      email - Modified person email

    • deletePerson

      public void deletePerson​(java.lang.String code, Type type)
      Deletes a person's information from the server. A StatusException is thrown if a member's status does not permit them to remove their account
      Parameters:
      code - Code associated with person to delete
      type - Type of account to delete

    • getService

      public Service getService​(java.lang.String code)
      Acquires a service from its given code or null if no service associated.
      Parameters:
      code - Service code
      Returns:
      The associated service or null if no service associated

    • createService

      public void createService​(java.lang.String name, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, Day[] occurrences, int capacityMax, java.lang.String comment, int fee, java.util.Date serviceTime, java.lang.String profNo)
      Creates a new service under the requesting professional's code.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the service
      startDate - Start date of the service
      endDate - End date of the service
      occurrences - Sessions weekly recurrence of the service
      capacityMax - Maximum capacity of service's sessions
      comment - Comment on service
      fee - Fee of each service's sessions
      serviceTime - Time of the day where sessions are to be undertaken
      profNo - Professional's code associated with requesting Professional

    • modifyService

      public void modifyService​(Service service, java.lang.String name, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, Day[] occurrences, int capacityMax, java.lang.String comment, int fee, java.util.Date serviceTime, java.lang.String profNo)
      Modifies information relative to the provided existing service.
      Parameters:
      service - Service to modify
      name - Modified service name
      startDate - Modified service start date
      endDate - Modified service end date
      occurrences - Modified service weekly recurrence
      capacityMax - Modified service maximum capacity
      comment - Modified service comment
      fee - Modified service fee
      serviceTime - Modified service time
      profNo - Modified service professional's number

    • deleteService

      public void deleteService​(java.lang.String code)
      Deletes a service's information from the server.
      Parameters:
      code - Code associated with service to delete

    • getSessionsToday

      public void getSessionsToday()
      Acquires the list of sessions available today and displays them onto the command line.

    • getAvailableServices

      public void getAvailableServices()
      Displays the list of available services.

    • confirmRegistration

      public void confirmRegistration​(java.lang.String memberNo, java.lang.String sessionNo, java.lang.String comment)
      Verifies a member's registration to a session so as to allow them to attend the session they are registered to. Note that the member number in this case represents the QR code that the member would usually present to the professional in charge.
      Parameters:
      memberNo - Member number
      sessionNo - Session number
      comment - Validation comment

    • registerSession

      public void registerSession​(java.lang.String memberNo, java.lang.String sessionNo, java.lang.String comment)
      Registers a member for a session. A StatusException is thrown if a member's status does not permit them to register into a session.
      Parameters:
      memberNo - Member number
      sessionNo - Session number
      comment - Registration comment

    • consultRegistrations

      public void consultRegistrations​(java.lang.String profNo, java.lang.String sessionNo)
      Permits a professional to access the list of registrations to a session they give. A StatusException is thrown and handled if a professional's status does not permit them to consult their registrations.
      Parameters:
      profNo - Professional number
      sessionNo - Session number
